Our Team

Meet the experts powering our success.

Dedicated Professionals

Surv. Azeez Saleem Adewale

Principal Partner

A seasoned surveyor and the driving force behind Geo‑Mapping Consults, Surv. Azeez combines decades of field experience with a passion for innovation. He holds an MSc in Project Management and has spearheaded numerous cadastral, engineering and GIS projects across Nigeria.

Surv. Adejare Adekunle Quadri

General Manager

With a PhD in surveying and multiple publications in international journals, Surv. Adejare oversees our operations and ensures each project meets exacting standards. His expertise lies in marine surveying and spatial planning.

Surv. Adewara M. Babalola

Head, Training & Capacity Development

An accomplished environmentalist and mentor, Surv. Adewara leads our training initiatives. He specialises in flood hydraulics, hydrological modelling and has authored several textbooks and papers.

Akiode Emmanuel Oluwafemi

Project Manager

A certified offshore surveyor with extensive experience in engineering and cadastral surveys, Emmanuel manages project timelines, resources and client relations to ensure successful outcomes.

Azeez Idris

Technical Crew Officer

Azeez is adept at using modern surveying instruments and software, with a strong background in GIS and remote sensing. He supports field operations and ensures data integrity.

Join Our Team

If you are passionate about geospatial technology and want to be part of a dynamic organisation, send us your resume. We are always interested in meeting talented professionals.
